name: Slime Expedition
description:
Hello everyone ! I'm a French fan of video games and I made a small 2D platformer game during my free time to see and understand how a video game is creating.

I'm not a developer at all, it's my first game, I looked at tutorials to create what I wanted to do. I sadly know there are some bugs (especially with the boss) and I'm really sorry at that but my goal wasn't to produce a perfect game, just a game where you can have some fun and I hope it will work.

I create it with Unity and made almost everything by myselft except for the music.

Here are the songs if you are interested in :
-Amarià - Funky Souls

-Amarià - Lovely Swindler

-Kings Trailer - Rafael Krux

Tell me if there are some things you didn't like or understand, I would love to have some feedback to understand what I did wrong. 

I hope you'll have some fun and thanks for playing it !
